types:type.name: automation-trigger-json-input
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type automation_trigger_json_input = {| sikuli_home_folder: String, sikuli_images_sub_folder: String, system_default_pictures_folder: String, whatsapp_desktop_exe_path: String, input_csv_file_name: String, process_done_flag_file: String |} {"example": "{\\\"sikuli_home_folder\\\":\\\"C:\\\\\\\\sikulix\\\",\\\"sikuli_images_sub_folder\\\":\\\"sikuli_images\\\",\\\"system_default_pictures_folder\\\":\\\"C:\\\\\\\\Users\\\\\\\\srk\\\\\\\\Pictures\\\",\\\"whatsapp_desktop_exe_path\\\":\\\"C:\\\\\\\\Users\\\\\\\\srk\\\\\\\\AppData\\\\\\\\Local\\\\\\\\WhatsApp\\\\\\\\WhatsApp.exe\\\",\\\"input_csv_file_name\\\":\\\"input_data.csv\\\",\\\"process_done_flag_file\\\":\\\"whatsapp_update_done.txt\\\"}"}

types:type.name: greetings-data-csv-input
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type greetings_data_csv_input = Array<{| Date: String, To: String, Occasion: String, Message: String, SendMsg: String, SendImage: String, WhatsAppUniqueDestinations: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}
